articles.title: Ratchet and Clank is now free on PS4 and PS5 - The Verge
articles.description: March kicks off Sony’s Play At Home Initiative, with the first game available being the 2016 remake of Ratchet and Clank. PS4 and PS5 owners can redeem the game for free until March 31st, no PlayStation Plus subscription required.
